name: Link in Bio (Notion Template)
description: Introducing the "Link in Bio" Notion template, a powerful tool for social media influencers, entrepreneurs, and creatives to manage and showcase their online presence. With this template, you can create a customized landing page that includes all your important links, such as your website, social media profiles, blog, and other online resources.The template is designed to be easy to use and fully customizable, allowing you to add your own branding, images, and text to create a unique online hub
features: 3 different layouts; 100% customizable templates; Simple yet powerful design
